name: prettier-plugin-x-babel-standard
description: Fork of prettier-plugin-x / prettier-plugin-x-babel / prettier-plugin-x-standard using Babel + prettierX, with defaults updated to match "Standard JS" formatting
author: @brodybits (Christopher J. Brody) <chris.brody+brodybits@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint-sample && npm run prettier-sample && npm run prettier-sample-babel-flow && npm run prettier-sample-babel-ts && npm run prettier-sample-flow && npm run prettier-sample-typescript
